page.title: 19Local churches.
page.content: In Westerhope there are three churches, St Johns, St Marks and Westerhope Methodist. Between these churches every week they have at least fifteen services. All kinds of people work in the churches doing small but important jobs like cleaning the churches and flower arranging. People work as churchwardens, servers and crucifer, who look after the church. At St Marks church they do not have a Sunday school like they have at St Johns and at Westerhope Methodist but they do have a Catholic school. Between these churches they have at least one hundred and thirty six weddings and one hundred and sixty christenings in a year. About nine hundred and fifty people go to these churches.
